value.original: The selected accounting entries will be deleted! DANGEROUS !!!

row.value: Conturile selectate vor fi şterse ! PERICULOS !!!

value.original: Only used if Price List is used to set future/standard cost price

row.value: Se utilizează numai dacă s-a utilizat preţul de cost viitor.

value.original: Overwrite how to pay the invoice
The Payment Rule indicates how the incoice will be settled - you can overwrite the value from the invoice.

row.value: Regula de Plată indică metoda de achitare a facturii.

value.original: The email is sent from the user selected - otherwise it is sent from the request email address of the client

row.value: The email is sent from the user selected - otherwise it is sent from the request email address of the client

value.original: Organizational entity within client - set to empty if you want to create a new organization

row.value: Entitate organizaţională în interiorul societăţii - rămâne gol, dacă doriţi să creaţi o organizaţie nouă

value.original: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

row.value: O Organizaţie este o unitate a Societăţii sau o entitate legală - ex. magazin, departament. Datele pot fi accesate între Organizaţii.

value.original: If no Role is selected, grant access to all (non-manual) roles of the Client

row.value: Dacă nu este selectat un Rol, permite accesul la toate rolurile (ne-manuale) ale Societăţii

value.original: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

row.value: Rolul determină securitatea şi accesul unui utilizator la Sistem.

value.original: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact

row.value: Utilizator în cadrul sistemului - Intern sau Contact Partner

value.original: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: Utilizator identifică un utilizator unic în sistem. Acesta poate fi un utilizator intern sau contact de partner

value.original: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

row.value: Ultima responsabilitate pentru un flux este cu un utilizator actual. Responsabilul de Flux permite definirea căilor de găsire a Utilizatorului actual.

row.value: Ultima responsabilitate pentru un flux este cu un utilizator actual. Responsabilul de Flux permite definirea căilor de găsire a Utilizatorului actual.

value.original: If not defined on Business Partner Level

row.value: Dacă nu este definit la nivel de Partener

value.original: The Shipment Date indicates the date printed on the shipment.

row.value: The Shipment Date indicates the date printed on the shipment.

value.original: Includes only the Tabs that Insert records
Generated Export Format for the Tabs with Insert Record is Yes

value.original: Valid from including this date (first day)

row.value: Valid from including this date (first day)

value.original: The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range

value.original: Only documents within this date range which are also in open periods will be reset.
